General.Name: Shandong Xinchao Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Xinchao Energy Corporation Limited engages in the exploration, production, and sale of oil and natural gas. It holds interest in oil fields in Crosby County, Texas; and shale oil and gas properties in Howard and Borden counties, Texas. The company was formerly known as Yantai Xinchao Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Xinchao Energy Corporation Limited in June 2016. Shandong Xinchao Energy Corporation Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
